name: V_EHI_RDI_FILTER
description: EHI filter view for the RDI masterfile. This view only contains abstraction RDI records as other types do not contain EHI.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the registry data record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The main patient CSNs that are associated with the record.
